title: Understanding Templates
text: A template is a pre-designed file that serves as a starting point for a new document. It helps maintain consistency and saves time.

title: Purpose of Templates
text: Templates are used to create documents with a consistent layout and design. They can include text, styles, and formatting.

hintAnswer: a $$special-purpose$$ workbook you can create and use as a pattern for new, similar workbooks or worksheets
title: Identifying the Correct Definition
text: Which of the following best describes a template?
choices: a $$special-purpose$$ workbook you can create and use as a pattern for new, similar workbooks or worksheets
a type of style of cells
a storage space that serves to store standardized documents
